fullText: As enjoyable and affecting as Harmony is—and as timely, with antisemitism on the rise worldwide—it doesn’t make the case that, among all that we must never forget, the Comedian Harmonists merit quite this degree of remembrance.

keyPhrases.quote: As enjoyable and affecting as Harmony is
doesn't make the case that...the Comedian Harmonists merit quite this degree of remembrance
it doesn’t make the case that...the Comedian Harmonists merit quite this degree of remembrance

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges the show is 'enjoyable and affecting' but fundamentally questions whether the subject matter justifies a full Broadway treatment, suggesting qualified appreciation rather than strong recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review expresses enjoyment but ultimately questions the significance of the subject matter, leading to a mixed-positive recommendation.
